title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government Rates and Other
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government Rates and Other 

Matters Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited local government rate matter act 2019 (commencement) order 2022

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The 4th day of April 2022 is appointed to be the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 4th day of April 2022 is appointed to be the day on which 
paragraphs (a), (b) and (c) of section 26 of the Local Government Rates and 
Other Matters Act 2019 (No. 24 of 2019) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [164] 3

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 4 April 2022 as the date on which paragraphs (a), (b) and 
(c) of section 26 of the Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 
(No. 24 of 2019) shall come into operation. 

The provisions technically amend the transitional arrangements provided for 
under sections 22(2), 25(2) and 26(2) of 
the Residential Tenancies 
(Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 14 of 2019) in relation to the requirement for the 
annual registration of tenancies with the Residential Tenancies Board (RTB) 
and the associated tenancies registration fees in the private residential rented 
sector and the approved housing body rented sector. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [164]
